attributes.action: force british airways to change its name to london airways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British airways only do 11 european flights outside of london, 1 from newcastle 5 from birmingham 5 from manchester and no flights from the whole of scotland wales and northern island. not exactly british is it. lets call them what they are london airways.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
